meanings.definition: A decorative pin worn on a scarf or tie.
meanings.sent1: She admired the shiny scarfpin on his tie.
meanings.sent2: He carefully fastened the scarfpin to his scarf.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the dangling scarfpin on her scarf.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a scarfpin, adding a touch of sparkle to the room.
meanings.sent5: The scarfpin, with its intricate design, caught the light beautifully.
